tool_description: Sends automated appointment reminders to pet owners via multiple communication channels with customizable timing and message content.

contact_method.description: Method of communication (email, sms, phone, all)

error_messages: Appointment not found: The specified appointment_id does not exist.
Invalid contact method: Use one of [email, sms, phone, all].
Invalid reminder timing: Use one of [24hours, 2hours, 30minutes].
Missing contact information: No valid contact information found for the pet owner.
Communication failure: Unable to send reminder via the specified method.
Reminder already sent: A reminder has already been sent for this timing.
usage: Provide appointment_id, contact_method, and reminder_timing to send appointment reminders; optionally include preparation instructions and directions.

reminder_sent.description: Whether the reminder was successfully sent

delivery_method.description: Method through which reminder was delivered
